host_shield.text_preview:
RSS
Documentation
Release Notes
Host Shield for Linux
Host Shield for Linux Release Notes
Welcome to the release notes for Sysdig Host Shield for Linux.
Starting from version 13.9.0, the new Linux Host Shield release notes will be available on this page.
Deprecation Notice
Support Ending
Support for Agent versions older than 13.5.0 will end on November 28th, 2025, in line with the one-year support policy. We encourage you to complete your migration before this date.
The Customer Success team is available to support and guide you through the migration process to ensure a smooth transition.
See the
deprecation policy
for more details.
14.2.4 November 19, 2025

Deprecation Notes
Deprecation Notes
Welcome to the deprecation notes for the SaaS and OnPrem versions of the Sysdig Platform. As part of our commitment to continuously improve the Sysdig platform, Sysdig may deprecate features and components over time. Deprecation decisions are made carefully, often in conjunction with new or improved capabilities.
